name: ducks-trainer-portal
description: Comprehensive coaching portal with WGER exercise integration

scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && cross-env FLASK_APP=app.py flask db migrate
scripts.db:upgrade: cd backend && cross-env FLASK_APP=app.py flask db upgrade
scripts.db:downgrade: cd backend && cross-env FLASK_APP=app.py flask db downgrade base
scripts.db:import-exercises: python -c "from backend.app import create_app; from backend.import_from_json import import_exercises_from_json; app = create_app(); app.app_context().push(); print(import_exercises_from_json())"
